## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an "x" -->

- [ ] `feat` - New feature
- [ ] `fix` - Bug fix
- [ ] `docs` - Documentation update
- [ ] `style` - Code style changes (formatting, etc.)
- [ ] `refactor` - Code refactoring
- [ ] `perf` - Performance improvement
- [ ] `test` - Adding or updating tests
- [ ] `build` - Build system or dependency changes
- [ ] `ci` - CI/CD changes
- [ ] `chore` - Other changes (maintenance, etc.)

## Checklist

**Before submitting, ensure you've completed:**

- [ ] Ran `npm run lint`
- [ ] Ran `npx tsc --noEmit`
- [ ] Ran `npm test`
- [ ] If dependencies changed: ran `npm audit` (and `npm audit fix` if needed)
- [ ] Updated tests/docs if behavior changed

**If applicable:**

- [ ] Added E2E tests for user-facing changes
- [ ] Verified changes work offline (service worker)
- [ ] Tested on different screen sizes/browsers
- [ ] Checked accessibility with keyboard navigation
